NewsLines.HeadLine: SHORT PROFILE: Olaf Scholz, Germany's Chancellor

NewsLine.NewsLineText: NOTE: THIS PROFILE IS NOT REALATED TO ANY NEWS AND IS FOR THE PURPOSES OF UPDATING AFP ARCHIVES

body.content.p: SHORT PROFILE of Olaf Scholz, Germany's Chancellor. SHORT PROFILE OF OLAF SCHOLZ

MARCH 12, 2018
